SEARCH
Module it.polimi.ingsw.gc03
Package it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui

Class ApplicationGui

java.lang.Object
javafx.application.Application
it.polimi.ingsw.gc03.view.gui.ApplicationGui
public class ApplicationGui extends javafx.application.Application
The ApplicationGui class represents the main GUI application for the game, handling the initialization, scene management, and various interactions.

  • Nested Class Summary
